title: Calls for Trump's election interference trial to be televised part of long debate
description: Congressional Democrats are urging the federal judiciary to change rules for camera access to televise Donald Trump's trials.

title: Lifetime voting ban for felony convictions struck down in Mississippi
description: A Lifetime voting ban for felony convictions has been struck down in Mississippi.

title: Chaos erupts in New York City after promise of free PlayStations
description: A promise of free PlayStations led to a chaotic scene of unrest in New York City's Union Square.

title: Employee fired for allowing diesel fuel to leak into city water supply
description: A Germantown, Tennessee, staffer has been fired after an investigation revealed they did not monitor the refueling of a generator powering a water treatment facility.

title: Teen in custody in fatal stabbing of NYC dancer O'Shae Sibley: Sources
description: A teenager is in custody in connection with the fatal stabbing of New York City dancer O'Shae Sibley, police sources told ABC News.

title: Parkland mass shooting to be reenacted, with gunfire, for lawsuit
description: The Parkland, Florida, high school massacre will be reenacted in the same building on Friday as a part of a lawsuit.

title: What Mike Pence has said that could be used in a Donald Trump trial
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence left open the possibility of his testifying at Donald Trump's potential criminal trial over efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: WATCH:  Disney's Animal Kingdom welcomes adorable baby monkey
description: Saffron, a 3-pound baby mandrill, resides with her mom Hazel in the treetops of her habitat on Kilimanjaro Safaris at Disney's Animal Kingdom.

title: Mega Millions jackpot climbs to $1.35 billion ahead of Friday night drawing
description: The drawing for Mega Millions' estimated $1.35 billion jackpot is Friday night.

title: Baby monitors recalled due to burn risks
description: The batteries in the Philips Avent Digital Video Baby Monitors can overheat, according to the CPSC.

title: Russian court extends detention of American musician
description: A Russian court has extended the detention of Travis Leake, an American musician arrested on drugs charges, amid fears Russia is targeting Americans as hostages.

title: Orange County judge arrested in murder of his wife: Police
description: Anaheim police have arrested Orange County Superior Court Judge Jeffrey Ferguson for allegedly shooting and killing his wife, 65-year-old Sheryl Ferguson, in their home.

title: Prosecutors seek bail revocation for FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried
description: Prosecutors balked at Bankman-Fried's sharing with The New York Times excerpts from the personal documents of Caroline Ellison, who led his Alameda Research hedge fund.

title: A cyberattack has disrupted hospitals and health care in five states
description: A cyberattack has affected computers at hospitals in multiple states, forcing some emergency rooms to close and ambulances to be diverted

title: Man faces possible death sentence after convicted of fatally shooting deputy sheriff
description: A Texas man has been convicted in the fatal shooting of a west Texas deputy sheriff and faces a death sentence or life in prison without parole

title: Teenager charged after throwing gas on a bonfire, triggering explosion that burned 17
description: Prosecutors have charged a Wisconsin teenager with triggering a bonfire explosion that injured more than a dozen people

title: US hiring slows in July: Employers add a still-solid 187,000 jobs
description: U.S. employers added 187,000 last month, fewer than expected, as the higher interest rates continued to weigh on the economy

title: FIFA investigating misconduct allegations involving Zambia at Women's World Cup
description: FIFA, soccer's world governing body, confirmed Friday that it is investigating alleged misconduct involving the women's national team of Zambia during the World Cup.

title: FBI gives lie-detector tests to family of missing Wisconsin boy James Yoblonski
description: The FBI has joined a weekslong search for a missing Wisconsin boy

title: Gilgo Beach: Another victim ID'd in serial killing investigation, sources say
description: Suffolk County authorities have identified another victim in the Gilgo Beach investigation, which they are expected to reveal at a 10:30 a.m. news conference.

title: WATCH:  Car drives off collapsed bridge into crater
description: Heavy rains in China have caused flooding that has damaged infrastructure.

title: Nearly two-thirds of Americans think Jan. 6 charges against Trump are serious: POLL
description: A majority of Americans (51%) think Tuesday's indictment of Donald Trump related to his efforts to overturn the 2020 election is very serious, a ABC News/Ipsos poll found

title: Jailed Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny braces for verdict in latest trial
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin's most prominent opponent, Alexey Navalny, could be sentenced to an additional two decades behind bars on extremism charges.

title: Russia to announce a verdict in Navalny's case; lengthy prison term expected
description: Imprisoned Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is due to hear the verdict in his latest trial on extremism charges

title: Influencer Andrew Tate released from house arrest while he awaits trial
description: Andrew Tate, the divisive internet influencer who is charged in Romania with rape, human trafficking, and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women, has won his appeal to be released from house arrest

title: Police detain a suspect in South Korea's 2nd stabbing attack in 2 days
description: South Korean police have detained a man suspected of stabbing a high school teacher with a knife in the city of Daejeon

title: Russia accuses Ukraine of attacking Black Sea navy base and Crimea with drones
description: Russia had accused Ukraine of attacking its Black Sea navy base in the port of Novorossiysk with sea drones

title: Deadly flooding in China worsens as rescues continue and areas brace for high water
description: Heavy rain and high water levels of China's northeastern rivers are threatening cities downstream, prompting the evacuation of thousands

title: Lawyer for Bryan Kohberger says he was driving alone night of murders
description: Lawyer for Idaho college killings suspect Bryan Kohberger says he was driving alone at the time of murders

title: 2 members of expelled 'Tennessee Three' vie to win back their legislative seats
description: Tennessee Reps. Justin Pearson and Justin Jones have reclaimed their legislative seats after they were expelled for involvement in a gun control protest on the House floor

title: Appeals court allows Biden asylum restrictions to temporarily stay in place as case plays out
description: An appeals court is allowing a rule restricting asylum at the southern border to temporarily stay in place in a major win for the Biden administration

title: WATCH:  Monkey snatches woman's purse in Bali
description: Visitors to Bali’s Ubud Monkey Forest are warned to hold on tight to their belongings. This woman is lucky to have gotten her purse back.

title: 2 US Navy sailors arrested for allegedly spying for China
description: Two U.S. Navy sailors have been arrested on charges related to allegedly spying for China, federal prosecutors announced on Thursday
